content.description: SDS matched on the sloping rail, make a big move to the lip or hit those semi horrible overhanging crimps to get there, good problem, but kind of a one move wonder 2* for the starting setup and move!
content.protection: 1-2 pads, rocky landing that needs some coverage
content.location: Center of the Milagro Beanfield Boulder! On the right about 400ft down the trail from the road.

content.description: SDS on the lowest part of the boulder.  Climb up the overhanging arete using the finger crack. Bigger moves to almost positive holds at the lip. V4 variation if you Traverse over right and do the right topout for Taos Turkey instead of the left top out.
content.protection: 1-2 pads, kind of a rocky landing!
content.location: Margobean  boulder about 500ft down on the path on the right after mexican blanco boulder.

content.description: This is the overhanging boulder with a sloping rail through the middle about 500ft down the old road on the right. Great position on some great stone! This boulder shouldn't be missed.
